info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Franklin, southeastern Stephens, northwestern Hart, west central Anderson and south central Oconee Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Carnesville, or near Gumlog, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hartwell, Reed Creek, Lavonia, Gumlog, Canon, Bowersville, Martin, Avalon, Tugaloo State Park and Lake Hartwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
